articles.description: With another brace in the bag, his ritual of thanking all four sides of the Etihad Stadium continued and Man City's fans are now accustomed to staying behind to wave him off.
articles.content:
There might not have been a match ball for everybody to sign this week but Erling Haaland was still the last man off the pitch.
